Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Bradley Beal?

Bradley Beal is 32 years old.

Where was Bradley Beal born?

Bradley Beal was born in St. Louis, Missouri.

When was Bradley Beal born?

Bradley Beal was born on June 28, 1993.

How tall is Bradley Beal?

Bradley Beal is 6-4 (193 cm) tall.

How much does Bradley Beal weigh?

Bradley Beal weighs 207 lbs (93 kg).

Is Bradley Beal in the Hall of Fame?

Bradley Beal is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Bradley Beal drafted?

Bradley Beal was drafted by Washington Wizards, 1st round (3rd pick, 3rd overall), 2012 NBA Draft.

What position does Bradley Beal play?

Shooting Guard.

What is Bradley Beal's net worth?

Bradley Beal has made at least $318,079,481 playing professional basketball.

How much does Bradley Beal make?

Bradley Beal made $50,203,930 in 2025.

What does Bradley Beal average?

Bradley Beal averages 8.2 points, 0.8 rebounds, and 1.7 assists per game.

How many rings does Bradley Beal have?

Bradley Beal has won 0 championships.

What is Bradley Beal's Instagram account?

Bradley Beal is on Instagram at bradbeal3.

What schools did Bradley Beal attend?

Bradley Beal attended Chaminade College Prep in St. Louis, Missouri and Florida.

What are Bradley Beal's nicknames?

Real Deal, Big Panda, Blue Magic, Brad, Dr. Dre are nicknames for Bradley Beal.

Is Bradley Beal injured?

Bradley Beal is listed as Out For Season (Hip) - Beal will undergo season-ending surgery on his left hip, as per ESPN's Shams Charania reports.
